Mixed¶

Each (”)¶

      *"(_2 3;4 _5 6)
<_1 1
<1 _1 1
      *"_2 3
_1 1
  • Apply a monadic operator to a list or a simple array

Log (%.)¶

      10%. 1 10 100 1000 10000
0 1 2 2 3 4
      10%. 1 10 100 1000 10000 100000
0 1 2 3 4 5
      2%. 0.5 1 2 4 8 16
_1 0 1 2 3 4
      2 3 10%. 4 9 100
2 2 2
      e<-*.1
      e
2.718282
